# Investment Readiness Program Evaluation
## Solicitation Information

### Title
Evaluation of the Investment Readiness Program (IRP)

### Date and Time
* Tender Closing Date: September 13, 2023, 02:00 PM (EST)
* Publication Date: August 22, 2023
* Expected Contract Start Date: September 20, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: August 31, 2024

### Reference and Solicitation Numbers
* Reference Number: cb-8360-21028298
* Solicitation Number: 100024145

### Amendment Information
* Amendment Number: 2
* Amendment Date: March 19, 2023

### Tender Type and Status
* Tender Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Tender Status: Expiring

### Procurement Method
* Competitive - Selective Tendering

### Categories and Services
* Category: Evaluation Services Consultant
* Services: Management Consulting, Project Management and Evaluation

### Description of the Requirement
Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) invites bidders to provide evaluation services for the renewed Investment Readiness Program (IRP). The Contractor will be responsible for conducting a summative evaluation of the program to inform future policy direction. 

### Selection Conditions
The selection will be based on the highest combined rating of the technical merit and price.

### Contact Information
To request further information or clarification, please contact Marco Quiroga at NC-Solicitations-Gd@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca or (343) 576-1429. 140 Promenade du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0J9.
